resources.string: Find or choose the kind of waste from the list, to check how to recycle it properly.
Thank you for downloading Bin Assistant!
We hope that our work helps promoting ecological life-style.
We will be very grateful if you would like to leave us a feedback.
If you can see anything we could improve, please do not hesitate to contact us:

Huge specials thanks to everyone who contributed into the app:


App Icon made by Icongeek26 from www.flaticon.com:
 https://www.flaticon.com/authors/icongeek26


Used font: 'Lato' by Łukasz Dziedzic:
 https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Lato


Circular Progress Bar drawable code by M. Reza Nasirloo:
 https://medium.com/@m.reza.nasirloo


Cross Icon made by Lyolya from www.flaticon.com:
 https://www.flaticon.com/authors/lyolya


Search Engine Icon made by Vectors Market from www.flaticon.com:
 https://www.flaticon.com/authors/vectors-market
We are sorry, but currently the app content is available only in Polish language. English version is coming soon!
